lead_paragraph: Mauro Zárate scored the winning goal in the 86th minute yesterday as Argentina triumphed in the FIFA Under-20 World Cup for the sixth time, rallying to beat the Czech Republic, 2-1, in Toronto.The game appeared to be heading for extra time until Zárate cut in from the left and beat goalkeeper Radek Petr at the near post with a fierce shot from the edge of the penalty area.
